scripts.test:tapjs: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test -s || exit 0
scripts.test:ben-windows: hyperfine.exe --warmup 1 --runs 2 "npm run test:tapjs" "pnpm run test:jasmine"  "pnpm run test:jest" "pnpm run test:jest-better" "pnpm run test:vitest" "pnpm run test:vitest-better" "pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate" "pnpm run test:mocha" "pnpm run test:mocha-better" "pnpm run test:qunit" "pnpm run test:ava" "pnpm run test:tape" "pnpm run test:jest:inline" "pnpm run test:vitest:inline"
scripts.test:ben-linux: hyperfine --warmup 1 --runs 2 'pnpm run test:jasmine' 'pnpm run test:jest' 'pnpm run test:jest-better' 'pnpm run test:vitest' 'pnpm run test:vitest-better' 'pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate' 'pnpm run test:mocha' 'pnpm run test:mocha-better' 'pnpm run test:qunit' 'pnpm run test:ava' 'pnpm run test:tape' 'pnpm -s run test:tapjs' 'pnpm run test:jest:inline' 'pnpm run test:vitest:inline'
